description: Alter surface fluxes to impose model climatology plus observed historical anomalies of Sea Surface Temperature (SST) over the deep tropical eastern Pacific.  Monthly SST anomalies (1950-2014) will be provided by DCPP.  For groups that are unable to restore SSTs.
name: Impose SST Obs Trop E Pacific
rationale: To investigate the role of eastern Pacific sea surface temperatures in the modulation of global surface temperature trends and in driving regional climate variations.
longName: Impose observed anomalies of SST in the tropical eastern  Pacific
keywords: DCPP, SST, imposed, observations, eastern equatorial Pacific
